sentences.sContent: After finishing her degree and a brief period practicing law, Muir headed to B-school to teach.
sentences.sContent_eng: After finishing her degree and a brief period practicing law, Muir headed to B-school to teach.
sentences.sCn: 在获得学位并短暂执业后，穆尔去了商学院教书。

sentences.sContent: Dee Leopold, who earned her Harvard MBA in 1980 and has been working at the B-school for many years, the last six as director of admissions, offers some clues.
sentences.sContent_eng: Dee Leopold, who earned her Harvard MBA in 1980 and has been working at the B-school for many years, the last six as director of admissions, offers some clues.
sentences.sCn: 迪•利奥波德1980年获得哈佛MBA学位，已在哈佛商学院工作多年，近六年来一直担任招生主管。 我们不妨听听她高见。
